permissions.context: Hi there, to get to know you better

askForColors.grettingAgain: Hi again %s. What's your favorite color?
askForColors.withoutPermissions: Ok, no worries. What's your favorite color?

noInputReprompt.firstAsk: Which color would you like to hear about?
noInputReprompt.secondAsk: Please say the name of a color.
noInputReprompt.sorryTrouble: Sorry we're having trouble. Let's try this again later. Goodbye.

responseForColors.withPermissions: <speak>%s, your lucky number is %s.<audio src="%s"></audio> Would you like to hear some fake colors?</speak>
responseForColors.withoutPermissions: <speak>Your lucky number is %s.<audio src="%s"></audio> Would you like to hear some fake colors?</speak>
